name: 1D Chess (4DTri)
description:
A EXPERIMENTAL ATTEMPT TO MAKE A CHESS DEMAKE

🅾️: THIS TILE CAN MOVE ONE SPACE IN ANY DIRECTION

❎: THIS TILE CAN JUMP 2 SPACES IN EITHER DIRECTION

➡️: THIS TILE CAN MOVE 1-2 SPACES IN THE DIRECTION IT'S FACING

(X) TO SELECT A TILE TO MOVE

(Z) TO CHANGE THE TILE TO ANOTHER TILE (THIS USES YOUR TURN TOO)

NOTE:

SPACE 1 AND 11 CONNECT TO EACH OTHER
